verses.verse: When <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was come down <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mountain, <S%G3735><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> there came <S%G2064><s%> a leper <S%G3015><s%> and worshiped <S%G4352><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> thou wilt, <S%G2309><s%> thou canst <S%G1410><s%> make me clean. <S%G2511><s%> <S%G3165><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> put forth <S%G1614><s%> his hand, <S%G5495><s%> and touched <S%G680><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> I will; <S%G2309><s%> be thou clean. And <S%G2511><s%> <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> his <S%G846><s%> leprosy <S%G3014><s%> was cleansed. <S%G2511><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> See <S%G3708><s%> thou tell <S%G2036><s%> no man; <S%G3367><s%> but <S%G235><s%> go thy way, <S%G5217><s%> show <S%G1166><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> priest, <S%G2409><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> offer <S%G4374><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> gift <S%G1435><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> commanded, <S%G4367><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> a testimony <S%G3142><s%> unto them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum, <S%G2584><s%> there came <S%G4334><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> a centurion, <S%G1543><s%> beseeching <S%G3870><s%> him, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> servant <S%G3816><s%> lieth <S%G906><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> home <S%G3614><s%> sick of the palsy, <S%G3885><s%> grievously <S%G1171><s%> tormented. <S%G928><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will come <S%G2064><s%> and heal <S%G2323><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> centurion <S%G1543><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G5346><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> worthy <S%G2425><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> thou shouldest come <S%G1525><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> roof: <S%G4721><s%> but <S%G235><s%> speak <S%G2036><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> servant <S%G3816><s%> shall be healed. <S%G2390><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am a <S%G1510><s%> man <S%G444><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> authority, <S%G1849><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> soldiers <S%G4757><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> me: <S%G1683><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to this <S%G5129><s%> man, Go, <S%G4198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he goeth; <S%G4198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to another, <S%G243><s%> Come, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he cometh; <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to my <S%G3450><s%> servant, <S%G1401><s%> Do <S%G4160><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he doeth <S%G4160><s%> it.

When <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, he marveled, <S%G2296><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them that followed, <S%G190><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> I have not found <S%G2147><s%> so great <S%G5118><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> no, not <S%G3761><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> shall come <S%G2240><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the east <S%G395><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> west, <S%G1424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall sit down <S%G347><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> children <S%G5207><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> shall be cast out <S%G1544><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> outer <S%G1857><s%> darkness: <S%G4655><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> weeping <S%G2805><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> centurion, <S%G1543><s%> Go thy way; <S%G5217><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> thou hast believed, <S%G4100><s%> so be it done <S%G1096><s%> unto thee. And <S%G4671><s%> <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> servant <S%G3816><s%> was healed <S%G2390><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the selfsame <S%G1565><s%> hour. <S%G5610><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Peter's <S%G4074><s%> house, <S%G3614><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wife's mother <S%G3994><s%> laid, <S%G906><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sick of a fever. <S%G4445><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he touched <S%G680><s%> her <S%G846><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fever <S%G4446><s%> left <S%G863><s%> her: <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> she arose, <S%G1453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ministered <S%G1247><s%> unto them. <S%G846><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> the even <S%G3798><s%> was come, <S%G1096><s%> they brought <S%G4374><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> that were possessed with devils: <S%G1139><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he cast out <S%G1544><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> with his word, <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> healed <S%G2323><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that were sick: <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2560><s%>

That <S%G3704><s%> it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which was spoken <S%G4483><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> prophet, <S%G4396><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> infirmities, <S%G769><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bare <S%G941><s%> our sicknesses. <S%G3554><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> he gave commandment <S%G2753><s%> to depart <S%G565><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> other side. <S%G4008><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> a certain <S%G1520><s%> scribe <S%G1122><s%> came, <S%G4334><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Master, <S%G1320><s%> I will follow <S%G190><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> whithersoever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G1437><s%> thou goest. <S%G565><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> foxes <S%G258><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> holes, <S%G5454><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> birds <S%G4071><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> air <S%G3772><s%> have nests; <S%G2682><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> to lay <S%G2827><s%> his head. <S%G2776><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> suffer <S%G2010><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> to go <S%G565><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bury <S%G2290><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> father. <S%G3962><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> me; <S%G3427><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> let <S%G863><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> bury <S%G2290><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> dead. <S%G3498><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> when he <S%G846><s%> was entered <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a ship, <S%G4143><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him, <S%G846><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> there arose <S%G1096><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> tempest <S%G4578><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sea, <S%G2281><s%> insomuch that <S%G5620><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ship <S%G4143><s%> was covered <S%G2572><s%> with <S%G5259><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> waves: <S%G2949><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was asleep. <S%G2518><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him and awoke <S%G1453><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> us: <S%G2248><s%> we perish. <S%G622><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> ye fearful, <S%G1169><s%> O ye of little faith? <S%G3640><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> he arose, <S%G1453><s%> and rebuked <S%G2008><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> winds <S%G417><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sea; <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> calm. <S%G1055><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> men <S%G444><s%> marveled, <S%G2296><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> What manner of man <S%G4217><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> winds <S%G417><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sea <S%G2281><s%> obey <S%G5219><s%> him! <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he <S%G846><s%> was come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> other side <S%G4008><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> country <S%G5561><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Gergesenes, <S%G1086><s%> there met <S%G5221><s%> him <S%G846><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> possessed with devils, <S%G1139><s%> coming <S%G1831><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> tombs, <S%G3419><s%> exceeding <S%G3029><s%> fierce, <S%G5467><s%> so that <S%G5620><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> might <S%G2480><s%> pass <S%G3928><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> way. <S%G3598><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> they cried out, <S%G2896><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> What have we to do with thee, <S%G5101><s%> <S%G2254><s%> <S%G4671><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> thou Son <S%G5207><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%> art thou come <S%G2064><s%> hither <S%G5602><s%> to torment <S%G928><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the time? <S%G2540><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> a good way off <S%G3112><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%> an herd <S%G34><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> swine <S%G5519><s%> feeding. <S%G1006><s%>

So <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> devils <S%G1142><s%> besought <S%G3870><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> thou cast us out, <S%G1544><s%> <S%G2248><s%> suffer <S%G2010><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> to go away <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> herd <S%G34><s%> of swine. <S%G5519><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Go. And <S%G5217><s%> <S%G1161><s%> when they were come out, <S%G1831><s%> they went <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> herd <S%G34><s%> of swine: <S%G5519><s%> and, <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> whole <S%G3956><s%> herd <S%G34><s%> of swine <S%G5519><s%> ran violently <S%G3729><s%> down <S%G2596><s%> a steep place <S%G2911><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sea, <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> perished <S%G599><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> waters. <S%G5204><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they that kept <S%G1006><s%> them fled, <S%G5343><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> went their ways <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> told <S%G518><s%> every thing, <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> what was befallen <S%G3588><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> possessed of the devils. <S%G1139><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> whole <S%G3956><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> came out <S%G1831><s%> to meet <S%G1519><s%> <S%G4877><s%> Jesus: <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> when they saw <S%G1492><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> they besought <S%G3870><s%> him that <S%G3704><s%> he would depart <S%G3327><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> coasts. <S%G3725><s%>
